mapper.select: SELECT sb.*, u.name as user_name, u.phone as user_phone FROM studio_booking sb LEFT JOIN user u ON sb.user_id = u.id WHERE sb.studio_id = #{studioId} ORDER BY sb.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT sb.*, cs.studio_name FROM studio_booking sb LEFT JOIN consult_studio cs ON sb.studio_id = cs.id WHERE sb.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sb.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studio_booking WHERE studio_id = #{studioId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studio_booking WHERE studio_id = #{studioId} AND status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studio_booking (studio_id, user_id, order_no, status, price, payment_time) VALUES (#{studioId}, #{userId}, #{orderNo}, #{status}, #{price}, #{paymentTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE studio_booking SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
